short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a shuffle button to YouTube. Discover random videos from you homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover new videos based on your interests, this extension picks a random video from your youtube homepage. Just click on the shuffle icon.
